general_advisory: Light rainfall may occur on Saturday & Sunday with generally cloudy to overcast sky. Keep the harvested paddy in a safe place with polythene to protect it from rain. Make provisions for draining out excess rainwater.

advisory: Prepare the wet nursery seed beds for paddy. Apply fertilizers and prepare for transplanting.
Maintain irrigation channels for drainage purposes.
Sow sprouted seeds with appropriate spacing.
Planting should be done in well-drained soil with good irrigation facilities.
Spray Neem-based pesticide for fruit and shoot borer control.
Follow up with alternate sprays for effective control.
Apply borax for browning or brown rot prevention.
